I

isVUServerAnswering(String, String) - Static method in class de.plasticghoul.vudials.MCVUDialsHelper
This method tests if the VU Server is answering to HTTP requests.
isVUServerAvailable() - Static method in class de.plasticghoul.vudials.MCVUDialsHelper
This method tests if the VU Server is listening and answering by calling isVUServerListening() and isVUServerAnswering().
isVUServerListening(String, int) - Static method in class de.plasticghoul.vudials.MCVUDialsHelper
This method tests if the VU Server is listening on the configured hostname and port.

O

onEntityHeal(LivingHealEvent) - Method in class de.plasticghoul.vudials.MCVUDials
This event method triggers when the player is healing During this event, the health value and color can be updated
onEntityHurt(LivingHurtEvent) - Method in class de.plasticghoul.vudials.MCVUDials
This event method triggers when the player is hurt During this event, the health value and color can be updated
onLoggedIn(PlayerEvent.PlayerLoggedInEvent) - Method in class de.plasticghoul.vudials.MCVUDials
This event method triggers when the player joins a world During this event, all initial dial values, colors and images will be set
onLoggedOut(PlayerEvent.PlayerLoggedOutEvent) - Method in class de.plasticghoul.vudials.MCVUDials
This event method triggers when the player leaves a world During this event, all dial values, colors and images will be reset
onPlayerTick(TickEvent.PlayerTickEvent) - Method in class de.plasticghoul.vudials.MCVUDials
This event method triggers on each player tick.
onServerStarting(ServerStartingEvent) - Method in class de.plasticghoul.vudials.MCVUDials
This event method triggers when the minecraft server starts (the world is loaded) During this event, the mod tries to get all the dial UIDs

API base URL that gets assembled by onLoad()

vuServerEnabled - Static variable in class de.plasticghoul.vudials.MCVUDialsConfig
True if this mod is enabled
vuServerHostname - Static variable in class de.plasticghoul.vudials.MCVUDialsConfig
Hostname of the VU Server (default: localhost)
vuServerPort - Static variable in class de.plasticghoul.vudials.MCVUDialsConfig
Port of the VU Server (0-65535, defaul: 5340)
